    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:MELT-04602000.15</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>MELT-04602000.15</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Vorkommen der Metalle in der Erdkruste</string>
            <string language="en">Metal deposits in the Earth's crust</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gisements en métal dans la croûte de terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Depósitos do metal na crosta de terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giacimenti del metallo nella crosta terrestre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταθέσεις μετάλλων στη γήινη κρούστα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Depósitos del metal en la corteza de tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Aufgeführt sind die verschiedenen Metalle, die in der Erdkruste vorkommen: Rohmetalle, Silicate, Halogenide, Sulfide, Oxide und Carbonate</string>
            <string language="en">Specification of different metals being found in the Earth's crust: Crude metals, silicates, halides, sulfides, oxides and carbonates.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Metall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Erdkruste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth's crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cahier des charges de différents métaux étant 
trouvés dans la croûte de terre : Métaux, silicates, 
halogénures, sulfures, oxydes et carbonates bruts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Especificação dos metais diferentes que estão 
sendo encontrados na crosta de terra: Metais, silicatos, 
halides, sulfides, óxidos e carbonatos crus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Specifica dei metalli differenti che sono trovati
nella crosta terrestre: Metalli, silicati, alogenuri, solfuri, 
ossidi e carbonati grezzi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προδιαγραφή του εύρεσης των διαφορετικών μετάλλων στη 
γήινη κρούστα: Ακατέργαστα μέταλλα, πυριτικά άλατα, 
αλογονίδια, σουλφίδια, οξείδια και ανθρακικά άλατα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Especificación de diversos metales que son 
encontrados en la corteza de tierra: Metales, silicatos, 
halides, sulfuros, óxidos y carbonatos crudos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Métal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La croûte de terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crosta de terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metallo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Crosta terrestre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέταλλο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γήινη κρούστα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corteza de tierra</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
